definition[0]: a piece of equipment used to mix things together
definition[1]: a piece of equipment or computer software which is used to control the sound levels or picture quality of a recording or film, or a person whose job is to use this equipment
definition[2]: a drink that can be mixed with alcohol, especially to make a cocktail
example[4]: We can use tonic water or orange juice as mixers.
definition[3]: a party held so that people who have just met can get to know each other better
example[5]: Are you going to the freshman mixer?
